---
id: get-game-tag-options
title: "Get Game Tag Options"
description: "Get all tags for the corresponding game, that can be applied to any of its mods. Successful request will return an array of [Game Tag Option Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-tag-option-object). We recommended reading the [filtering documentation](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#filtering) to return only the records you want."
sidebar_label: "Get Game Tag Options"

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Game Tag Options"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all tags for the corresponding game, that can be applied to any of its mods. Successful request will return an array of [Game Tag Option Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-tag-option-object). We recommended reading the [filtering documentation](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#filtering) to return only the records you want.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={[]}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Get Game Tag Options","properties":{"data":{"description":"Array containing game tag objects.","items":{"title":"Game Tag Option Object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the tag group.","type":"string","example":"Theme"},"name_localization":{"description":"An object where keys are two-character language codes (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'fr') and values are the localized names.","type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"string","description":"Optional two-character language code with its corresponding value.","pattern":"^[a-zA-Z]{2}$"}},"type":{"description":"Can multiple tags be selected via 'checkboxes' or should only a single tag be selected via a 'dropdown'.","type":"string","example":"checkboxes"},"tags":{"description":"Array of tags in this group.","type":"array","items":{"description":"Tag value","type":"string","example":"Horror"}},"tags_localization":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"tag":{"description":"The tag.","type":"string"},"translations":{"properties":{"en":{"description":"English translation of the tag.","type":"string","example":""},"de":{"description":"German translation of the tag.","type":"string","example":""},"fr":{"description":"French translation of the tag.","type":"string","example":""}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"tag_count_map":{"description":"List of tag names and the count of mods with these tags.","type":"object","example":{"Horror":52},"additionalProperties":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"hidden":{"description":"Groups of tags flagged as 'hidden' are intended to be used for filtering (eg. game version), but should not be displayed to users. Hidden tags will only be returned if `show_hidden_tags` is set to `true`.","type":"boolean","example":false},"locked":{"description":"Groups of tags flagged as 'locked' are editable only if the authenticated user is a team member of the parent game. Useful for games to tag special functionality, which users can see and filter on (eg. competition winners).","type":"boolean","example":false}},"type":"object"}},"result_count":{"description":"Number of results returned in this request.","format":"int32","example":70},"result_offset":{"description":"Number of results skipped over. Defaults to 0 unless overridden by `_offset` filter.","format":"int32","example":0},"result_limit":{"description":"Maximum number of results returned in the request. Defaults to 100 (max) unless overridden by `_limit` filter.","format":"int32","example":100},"result_total":{"description":"Total number of results found.","format":"int32","example":70}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
